entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this morning and early this afternoon then partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
